name: SCP342 - Subway Lockout
description:
You awake on empty subway station.
How did you got here? Where are you? How to escape? Why there is nice subway pass infront of you?

Should you take it? Should you leave it?

Your choice. But remember  two things:

1) Please, do not ██████ the ████████ at all costs!
2) Your actions may have consequences.



This is my first game i made all by myself, while learning Unreal Engine basics.
I was streaming whole process on my Twitch, come to see how games being made
What started as jokingly walk-around-empty-room simulator ended in a small SCP universe based game.

Project became reality with strong support from my patreons and friends, and you can support my future projects, too! This will also give you early access to test builds of game im currently making  and more :3
If you interested, you can check my Patreon page, that will be appreciated.

I have discord server where i post gamedev updates and images, if you have any questions, you can join and chat.
